title: Klaus Schwab's THUGS Harass Conservative Journalists | Guests: Jack Posobiec & Ken Paxton | 5/24/22
description:
Glenn argues we are headed toward a very different America and explains how it's all coordinated through planned crises, such as the gas price hike. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton joins to discuss his primary election, updates on the border, and the lawsuits against President Biden. Author of "Race Marxism" James Lindsay joins to explain how visiting the state of Vermont left him hopeful for the future of America. Glenn and Stu go over the future America is headed toward, including digital money and a global monitoring system knowing your every move. TPUSA contributor Jack Posobiec shares how he was harassed and questioned by the World Economic Forum's "police." Author Bethany Mandel discusses her new book, "Rush Limbaugh and the First Amendment."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
